name: One Tap Fighter!
description:
ONE TAP FIGHTNING!

A game made for the one button jam.

HOW TO PLAY?

It is very easy! Just tap always on the green bar and beat your enemy.

You can play with mouse click, keyboard (enter key) or gamepad button.

*This is just a preview version. The game could recieve some improvements and bug fixes for the final version of the jam.
